name: Extra Luck
info: Keys and lockpicks drop at four times the usual rate and double Lucky and Unlucky title points

name: Zaishen Bounty
info: Double copper Zaishen Coin rewards for Zaishen bounties

name: Factions Elite
info: The Deep and Urgoz's Warren can be entered from Kaineng Center

name: Northern Support
info: Double Asura, Deldrimor, Ebon Vanguard, or Norn reputation points

name: Zaishen Mission

name: Pantheon
info: Free passage to the Underworld and the Fissure of Woe

name: Faction Support
info: Double Kurzick and Luxon title track points for exchanging faction

name: Zaishen Vanquishing
info: Double copper Zaishen Coin rewards for Zaishen vanquishes
